summary: Lance W. Svendsen was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCA). He is listed in multiple payroll certification reports from April 1978 to January 1979. These documents detail his name, social security number, position, salary, and employment dates within the SCA. The consistent appearance of his name across these payroll documents indicates his sustained employment with the committee during the specified period.
significance: Lance W. Svendsen's significance lies in his employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, contributing to the investigation, though the specific nature and impact of his role are not detailed in these documents.
